name: ART SQOOL
description:
U r a froshmin at 🅐 🅡 🅣 🅢 🅠 🅞 🅞 🅛. Ur assignments are generated & graded by an A.I.
🖌collect cool paintbrushes🖌
🖼make art🖼
✨achieve creative fulfillment✨
It's your freshman year at ART SQOOL. Make art and explore the beautiful, mysterious, sprawling Art Sqool Campus.
PROFESSOR QWERTZ, an art-trained neural network, will give you drawing prompts and use his high-tech capabilities to objectively grade your work.
Can a video game make you more creative? Can a video game make you a better artist? Can you complete all 50 assignments, collect all 18 brushes, and graduate from Art Sqool? Idk,,, that's on u!
Features:-3D exploration and 2D grafix-making implements
-Hundreds of inspiring and open-ended drawing prompts to jump start your creative brain.
-Realistic neural network grading simulation.
-18 brushes and creative tools to collect.
